title: Ticket #7721: Condor-C and Job Router should respect CHIRP_DELAYED_UPDATE_PREFIX
description:
Condor-C and the Job Router have a white list of attributes whose values they will propagate upstream from the job that they submit. This list should be expanded to include all attributes allowed by the config param CHIRP_DELAYED_UPDATE_PREFIX.

The gridmanager and job router set the effective owner of the qmgmt connection to the job owner, so no special checks for protected job attributes should be necessary (as is done in the shadow).
remarks:
